content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler and Offshore Pump Connection at position(-11.5, 25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore Pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe connections:
  - Pipe (position -13.5, 18.5)
  - Pipe (position -13.5, 22.5)
  - Pipe (position -10.5, 23.5)

### Steam Engine at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -11.5, 18.5)
- Pipe (position -13.5, 18.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to offshore pump
- Ensure there are no other entities blocking the connection path between the boiler and offshore pump. Check the positions of pipes and ensure they are placed correctly to allow for a clear connection.

### Errors when placing pipes
- Make sure to remove any obstructing pipes before attempting to place new pipes or reconnect existing ones. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
